keyword: how many calories are in coors light beer
title: How Many Calories Are in Coors Light Beer?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in Coors Light beer per 12 oz serving, plus carbs, protein, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Coors Light Beer?
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) bottle or can of Coors Light lager, chilled, no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by batch, serving size, and brand specifics; check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz Coors Light beer contains 102 kcal and 5 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Switch to regular Coors Banquet (per beer)

faqs.q: How many calories are in one Coors Light beer?
What are the carbs in Coors Light beer?
faqs.a: About 5 g carbs per 12 oz, with 0 g fiber and sugars.

faqs.q: Does Coors Light have protein or fat?
faqs.a: 0.9 g protein and 0 g fat per serving.

faqs.q: How does Coors Light compare to other light beers?
faqs.a: Similar to Bud Light (95 kcal) or Miller Lite (96 kcal) per 12 oz.

faqs.q: Is sodium high in Coors Light beer?
faqs.a: Low at 10 mg per 12 oz serving.
